post.author: Admin
post.title: Market Day orders are due by this Friday
post.description:
Hi Band Boosters,
Market Day orders are due by this Friday, February 6, 2015 at 11:00 pm at www.m
post.content:
Hi Band Boosters,

Market Day orders are due by this Friday, February 6, 2015 at 11:00 pm at www.marketday.com. Pick up is Thursday, February 12, 2015 from 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm in Cafeteria #2.

Please note that Market Day has changed our due date for orders to be the Friday before the sale instead of the Saturday before the sale by 11:00 pm.

If you purchase anything this month, you will receive a $20 credit from Shutterfly, an on-line photo processing company.

If you spend at least $90 this month and you will receive a free 60 count Cheese Ravioli when you enter promo code FEBBONUS. If you purchase three boxes of pre-portioned Cookie Dough flavors, you will receive one box of Chocolate Chunk Cookie Dough for free.

Any questions, please contact Sue Galuska at suegaluska@yahoo.com or 440-582-4120.

Thanks,
Sue Galuska
